description: This file defines a mock class 'rtObjectBaseMock' using Google Mock to facilitate unit testing of classes derived from 'rtObjectBaseImpl'. It provides mock methods for setting and getting properties and sending messages.

classes.name: rtObjectBaseMock
classes.description: A mock class for 'rtObjectBaseImpl' used in testing.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Mock method to set properties with different signatures for const char*, rtValue, and bool values.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Mock method to get property values based on property name.

methods.name: sendReturns
methods.description: Mock method for sending a message and receiving a result.
